column4: does anyone know how to connect from windows to a linux box directly through ethernet cable ?
sure, use a crossover cable and set static IPs
exctaly how should i do that ?
it's faster than going through router right ?
negligable
use network manager to set the IPs
the router will make the addressing easier
oh so not much speed difference ?
somehow i thought direct connection would be faster
hardly any at all, the router is a dedicated device and will route it fast. you'll get maybe an extra few kbps every minute
you'll be transferring at a decent enough speed so its negligable
if yuo take the drive out and put it in the other system to transfer it will be a lot faster
it's like 1mBps
no can do lol
you'd get about 280Mbps
uhm that's not an option i dont have external enclosure
both laptops :(
you can opem your PCs and connect the to the controllers inside, doesnt need an enclosure. Sounds like you dont play with hardware much so only do this if you are comfortable with hard drive installs
erhh i did say this is laptop didn't i lol there's no other places to plug the 2nd hdd
no you didn't, d'oh
lol yeah that's my problem
trust me if it's desktop i'd plug it in directly already
that's ok i'm sticking to current setup
